sys_script_include.description: On demand Script Include to validate email address syntax using regular expressions.
sys_script_include.name: GetEmailAddress

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_60f297c3879641103bac52873cbb3512
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_705716_trackerfl.GetEmailAddress</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>On demand Script Include to validate email address syntax using regular expressions.
</description><name>GetEmailAddress</name><script><![CDATA[function GetEmailAddress(emailStr){
    // Use JavaScript coercion to guarantee emailStr is a string
    emailStr = emailStr + '';
    // Compare emailStr against the allowed syntax as specified in the regular expression
    // If emailStr has allowed syntax, return true, else return false
    if(emailStr.match(/^(([^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/)){
      return true;
    }
    else {
     return false;
    }
  }]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-22 15:10:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>60f297c3879641103bac52873cbb3512</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetEmailAddress</sys_name><sys_package display_value="TrackerFlow" source="x_705716_trackerfl">fb20374b87c1c1103bac52873cbb3581</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="TrackerFlow">fb20374b87c1c1103bac52873cbb3581</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_60f297c3879641103bac52873cbb3512</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-22 15:48:30</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
